title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Spatial Pedagogy Strategies to Improve Mathematics Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Secondary Mathematics Curriculum and Online Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of a teacher’s movement patterns on learning engagement within a virtual classroom space.
Learners can propose optimal online lesson designs by utilizing spatial utilization metrics (e.g., dispersion index, interaction frequency).
Learners can demonstrate through project-based work the impact of spatial pedagogy in digital environments on mathematics concept acquisition.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
